page.title: 01A REVIEW OF BASSINGBOURN
page.content: Bassingbourn is in a shallow valley. To reach Bassingbourn you use the A14. In Bassingbourn there are 4 pubs, 3 schools and 4 bus stops. Around Bassingbourn there is quite a lot of farmland. The Village College provides most of our leisure activities. There are some recreation areas around the village. There are also 2 churches, 1 chapel that is not in use, and a cemetery. Bassingbourn has quite a lot of shops which sell nearly everything the village needs. The main road is called the High Street and has a doctor's surgery and a garage. There is now a dentist in Brook Road which opened in early 1985. The population of Bassingbourn is 3760,approximately 900 of these people are under 18 years. Bassingbourn is an expanding village and new houses are being built.
